messages.title: Get a postal vote to make sure you have your say on 7th May 2015
messages.content: We are just a couple of months away from the most important General Election for a generation. So much will depend on the outcome of 7th May, both nationally and locally.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure the economic recovery benefits all, creating jobs and improving living standards
Create a shared local vision, protecting and improving our area
Delivering local transport improvements, particularly on the underground

issues.economy: Our country was the fastest growing major economy in 2014 and is forecast to grow by a further 2.5% this year. Employment levels are continuing to rise and low inflation, low interest rates and low taxes (combined with increased wages), mean that for many, living standards have improved.

images.caption: Stephen Hammond MP - Member of Parliament for Wimbledon, Raynes Park & Morden

leaflet.additionalNotes: Postal Voting is a great way to make sure you have your say. Postal votes arrive about 10 days before the election and you can take your completed forms to the polling station if you are around on election day after all.
